channel.title: Boosting
channel.description:
When someone levels up skills on my server they get reward points in which they can spend in reward points shop.. When they kill rock crabs they get 10 points... I want to remove that. Also, I want to make it so leveling up combat stats doesn't add rewrd points either? Help please?
Also they can tele below 50 wild, i want to make it 20.
My base is PI, please help with these problems?

item.title: Boosting
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

If you would program with a program that is capable of a recursive file search you would have all your answers in seconds.

Search the message / 10 points in your source for the points. You might want to check the level up messages and see if that is how points are handled.

Config class, I believe for the wilderness teleportation option.

Read full topic
